children.title: Safety Policy
children.findingTemplate: The organisation maintains an up-to-date safety policy. Describe deviations here.

recommendations.1: Adopt a site-wide communication plan for safety policy updates.
recommendations.2: Introduce quarterly training refreshers focused on leadership accountability.
recommendations.3: Document all policy exceptions and review them during the annual audit.
recommendations.4: Escalate non-compliance cases to senior management within 5 working days.

children.title: PSA Usage
children.findingTemplate: Assess compliance with on-site personal safety equipment usage.

recommendations.1: Roll out refresher modules for PSA usage.
recommendations.4: Ensure supervisors perform spot checks twice per shift.
